spec_data.Name: bmc-snmp-proxy
spec_data.Description:
Given a host with BMC, this package would extend system configuration
of net-snmp to include redirections to BMC based SNMP.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 04 Aug 2017 12:18:26 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Reconfigure SNMP to include host SNMP agent within BMC
